message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DS, cs.DB, cs.SI, cs.NI

Reasoning: 
- cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) is the most likely category as the paper deals with secure management of positions on non-trusted servers and proposes an approach to address privacy problems. 
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) is also likely as the paper proposes an optimization of the placement of shares among servers. 
- cs.DB (Databases) is another possible category as the paper deals with storing and managing position information on servers. 
- cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) is a possible category as the paper mentions the popularity of location-based applications and services such as friend finders and geo-social networks. 
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) is also a possible category as the paper proposes optimization of location update protocols to minimize the number of messages between mobile device and location servers.
